    • Class metalign.hierarchy.lpcfg.MetricalLpcfgElementNotFoundException extends java.lang.Exception implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • tree

          MetricalLpcfgTree tree
          The tree which caused the Exception.

        • node

          MetricalLpcfgNode node
          The Node which caused the Exception.

    • Class metalign.hierarchy.lpcfg.MetricalLpcfgHead extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • length

          double length
          The length of this head, normalized so that a value of 1.0 represents the sub beat length.

        • tiesIn

          boolean tiesIn
          True if this head starts with a TIE. False otherwise. This can only be true if MetricalLpcfgHead.startQuantum == 0.

        • startQuantum

          double startQuantum
          The offset of the quantum which begins the first occurrence of a note of this head's length in the current node, normalized so that a value of 1.0 represents the sub beat length.

      serialVersionUID:

      • Serialized Fields

          java.util.Map<K,V> transitionMap

    • Class metalign.hierarchy.lpcfg.MetricalLpcfgTerminal extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      3L

      • Serialized Fields

        • reducedPattern

          java.util.List<E> reducedPattern
          The pattern of quantums that make up this terminal, in fully reduced form.

        • originalPattern

          java.util.List<E> originalPattern
          The pattern of quantums that make up this terminal, in unreduced form.

        • baseLength

          int baseLength
          The base length of this terminal, used to normalize in MetricalLpcfgTerminal.getHead().
